setting.label: Update Frequency (seconds)
setting.summary: Change the amount of time between label updates, in seconds. Defaults to 60.

setting.label: Insignia
setting.summary: Change the URL of the Insignia RSS feed (not recommended unless OGXbox goes down)

setting.label: XLink Kai
setting.summary: Change the URL of the XLink Kai feed (not recommended unless OGXbox goes down)
